official_title: To increase funding for the program of block grants to States for social services.
short_title: Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008

summary.text: Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008 - Amends title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act to increase FY2008 funding for the social services block grant program.

titles.title: Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008
To increase funding for the program of block grants to States for social services.
